messages.content: The input is a json. The output must a json. For every site id assign the feedbacks to feedbackSummaries, if there is no fitting feedbackSummary then create a new one

{ "fd0591ff-fa4a-41f5-9d2f-8fa34068d37f": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 1, "feedbackText": "The website takes too long to load, could you please improve the loading speed?" }, { "id": 2, "feedbackText": "I'm having trouble finding the contact information, could you make it more visible?" }, { "id": 3, "feedbackText": "The product images look a bit blurry, it would be great if they were sharper." }, { "id": 4, "feedbackText": "I'm a bit confused by the checkout process, could you simplify it?" }, { "id": 5, "feedbackText": "The website design looks a bit outdated, maybe it's time for a refresh?" }, { "id": 6, "feedbackText": "It would be helpful to know the shipping costs upfront." }, { "id": 7, "feedbackText": "The search function doesn't seem to be working very well, could you improve it?" }, { "id": 8, "feedbackText": "I'm having trouble viewing the website on my mobile device, could you make it more mobile-friendly?" }, { "id": 9, "feedbackText": "The product descriptions are a bit too brief, could you provide more details?" }, { "id": 10, "feedbackText": "I couldn't find a FAQ section, it would be nice to have one." }, { "id": 11, "feedbackText": "Your website is too slow" }, { "id": 12, "feedbackText": "The search bar is bugy" }, { "id": 13, "feedbackText": "The checkout is overwhelming" } ], "feedbackSummaries": [ "Slow loading", "Add contact info", "Blurry images", "Confusing checkout", "Add modern design" ] } }

{ "fd0591ff-fa4a-41f5-9d2f-8fa34068d37f": { "Slow loading": [1, 11], "Add contact info": [2], "Blurry images": [3], "Confusing checkout": [4, 13], "Add modern design": [5], "Display shipping costs upfront": [6], "Search bar not working": [7, 12], "Make website mobile friendly": [8], "Add more to product descriptions": [9], "Cannot find FAQ": [10] } }
The input is a json. The output must a json. For every site id assign the feedbacks to feedbackSummaries, if there is no fitting feedbackSummary then create a new one

{ "e8ddee2d-8190-4eb2-9f03-e192ad3d906c": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 11, "feedbackText": "The website layout feels a bit cluttered, could you declutter it?" }, { "id": 12, "feedbackText": "The navigation menu is a bit confusing, could you make it more user-friendly?" }, { "id": 13, "feedbackText": "It would be great to have a live chat option for quick assistance." }, { "id": 14, "feedbackText": "I'm a bit concerned about the website's security, could you ensure it's secure?" }, { "id": 15, "feedbackText": "I couldn't find a blog section, it would be nice to have one." }, { "id": 16, "feedbackText": "It would be convenient to have a wishlist feature." }, { "id": 17, "feedbackText": "A size guide would be really helpful when shopping for clothes." }, { "id": 18, "feedbackText": "It would be great to have a currency converter for international customers." }, { "id": 19, "feedbackText": "I'd love to be able to compare products side by side, could you add that feature?" }, { "id": 20, "feedbackText": "Could you allow guest checkout for quicker purchases?" }, { "id": 21, "feedbackText": "Good job with the website, it looks great. The only piece which is missing is a blog" }, { "id": 22, "feedbackText": "It would be nice to have a blog section" }, { "id": 23, "feedbackText": "I would like to be able to purchase things without having to sign up" } ], "feedbackSummaries": [ "Cluttered design", "Add user-friendly navigation", "Add live chat", "Secure website" ] } }

{ "e8ddee2d-8190-4eb2-9f03-e192ad3d906c": { "Cluttered design": [11], "Add user-friendly navigation": [12], "Add live chat": [13], "Secure website": [14], "Add blog section": [15, 21, 22], "Add wishlish": [16], "Add size guide": [17], "Add Currency converter": [18], "Add Compare feature": [19], "Add guest checkout": [20, 23], } }
The input is a json. The output must a json. For every site id assign the feedbacks to feedbackSummaries, if there is no fitting feedbackSummary then create a new one

{ "9f853537-1dbf-4821-a0b6-17d408f4aed6": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 24, "feedbackText": "Could you integrate social media links for better engagement?" }, { "id": 25, "feedbackText": "I'd love to be able to read product reviews before making a purchase." }, { "id": 26, "feedbackText": "A size chart would be really helpful when shopping for clothes." }, { "id": 27, "feedbackText": "It would be great to have product videos for a better understanding of the items." }, { "id": 28, "feedbackText": "Could you make gift cards available for gifting purposes?" }, { "id": 29, "feedbackText": "I'd be interested in joining a loyalty program if you had one." }, { "id": 30, "feedbackText": "It would be nice to have the option to customize products." }, { "id": 31, "feedbackText": "The website design feels a bit plain and boring, could you make it more visually appealing?" }, { "id": 32, "feedbackText": "I couldn't find a search bar, could you add one?" }, { "id": 33, "feedbackText": "It would be nice to have a newsletter signup option to stay updated." }, { "id": 34, "feedbackText": "Add a newsletter" }, { "id": 35, "feedbackText": "I would like to be able to see the sizes chart before buying" }, { "id": 36, "feedbackText": "Your products are very cool. It would be nice if you had videos of them" }, { "id": 37, "feedbackText": "You must have a search bar....." } ], "feedbackSummaries": [ "Add visually appealing design", "Add search bar", "Add product reviews" ] } }

{ "9f853537-1dbf-4821-a0b6-17d408f4aed6": { "Add visually appealing design": [31], "Add search bar": [32, 37], "Add product reviews": [25], "Add newsletter": [33, 34], "Add social media links": [24], "Add sizes chart": [26, 35], "Add product videos": [27, 36], "Add gift cards": [28], "Add a loyalty program": [29], "Customizable products": [30], } }
The input is a json. The output must a json. For every site id assign the feedbacks to feedbackSummaries, if there is no fitting feedbackSummary then create a new one

{ "0104a0bb-67b0-4288-b776-5c94db514f5b": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 38, "feedbackText": "It would be great to have a currency converter for international customers." }, { "id": 39, "feedbackText": "Could you allow guest checkout for quicker purchases?" }, { "id": 40, "feedbackText": "It would be great to have product videos for a better understanding of the items." }, { "id": 41, "feedbackText": "The website takes too long to load, could you please improve the loading speed?" }, { "id": 42, "feedbackText": "Could you add a contact form for easy communication?" }, { "id": 43, "feedb4ackText": "It would be great to have product filters for easier browsing." }, { "id": 44, "feedbackText": "I'd love to be able to zoom in on product images for better details." }, { "id": 45, "feedbackText": "It would be helpful to have a section for recently viewed products." }, { "id": 46, "feedbackText": "I'd love to be able to compare products side by side, could you add that feature?" }, { "id": 47, "feedbackText": "A size guide would be really helpful when shopping for clothes." }, { "id": 48, "feedbackText": "Your website is horrible, You can't event filter the products" }, { "id": 49, "feedbackText": "The site is very very very slow" }, { "id": 50, "feedbackText": "How can I contact you? There is no contact form. I don't want to write an email" } ], "feedbackSummaries": [ "Add product filters", "Add product zoom", "Add recently viewed products" ] } }

{ "0104a0bb-67b0-4288-b776-5c94db514f5b": { "Add product filters": [43, 48], "Add product zoom": [44], "Add recently viewed products": [45], "Add currency converter": [38], "Add guest checkout": [39], "Add videos for products": [40], "Improve website speed": [41, 49], "Add contact form": [42, 50], "Add compare for products": [46], "Add size guide": [47] } }
The input is a json. The output must a json. For every site id assign the feedbacks to feedbackSummaries, if there is no fitting feedbackSummary then create a new one

{ "4672416f-8795-4dfd-bf9d-5d67f4a3f94d": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 51, "feedbackText": "The website crashed when I tried to add an item to my cart. I had to refresh the page to continue shopping." }, { "id": 52, "feedbackText": "The website froze up when I tried to add an item to my cart. I had to close the browser and start over." }, { "id": 53, "feedbackText": "The website stopped responding when I tried to add an item to my cart. I had to wait a few minutes before it started working again." }, { "id": 54, "feedbackText": "I can't log in to my account, it keeps saying my credentials are invalid." }, { "id": 55, "feedbackText": "The website is showing incorrect pricing for some products. The prices don't match what's listed in the catalog." }, { "id": 56, "feedbackText": "The website crashed when I tried to check out. I lost all the items in my cart." }, { "id": 57, "feedbackText": "I can't add items to my cart, it keeps giving me an error message." }, { "id": 58, "feedbackText": "I keep getting an error when trying to log in to my account. It says there's a problem with the server." }, { "id": 59, "feedbackText": "The website is showing the wrong product information. The descriptions and images don't match the actual products." }, { "id": 60, "feedbackText": "The website crashed when I tried to view my order history. I had to restart my computer to get it working again." }, { "id": 61, "feedbackText": "The website layout feels a bit cluttered, could you declutter it?" }, { "id": 62, "feedbackText": "It would be great to have a live chat option for quick assistance." }, { "id": 63, "feedbackText": "I'd love to be able to read product reviews before making a purchase." }, { "id": 64, "feedbackText": "It would be convenient to have a wishlist feature." }, { "id": 65, "feedbackText": "A size chart would be really helpful when shopping for clothes." }, { "id": 66, "feedbackText": "Could you make gift cards available for gifting purposes?" }, { "id": 67, "feedbackText": "I'd be interested in joining a loyalty program if you had one." }, { "id": 68, "feedbackText": "It would be nice to have the option to customize products." }, { "id": 69, "feedbackText": "It would be great to have product videos for a better understanding of the items." }, { "id": 70, "feedbackText": "Could you allow guest checkout for quicker purchases?" }, { "id": 71, "feedbackText": "Why don't you have a wishlist????" }, { "id": 72, "feedbackText": "Your product descriptions are incorrect" }, { "id": 73, "feedbackText": "I'm unable to login, I've already resetted my password" } ], "feedbackSummaries": [ "Add wishlist", "Add size chart", "Website crash", "Login issue", "Incorrect pricing" ] } }

{ "4672416f-8795-4dfd-bf9d-5d67f4a3f94d": { "Add wishlist": [64, 71], "Add size chart": [65], "Website crash": [51, 52, 53, 56, 60], "Login issue": [54, 58, 73], "Incorrect pricing": [55], "Cannot add item to cart": [57], "Incorrect product descriptions": [59, 72], "Cluttered layout": [61], "Add live chat": [62], "Display product reviews": [63], "Add gift cards": [66], "Add a loyalty program": [67], "Customizable products": [68], "Add videos to products": [69], "Guest checkout": [70] } }
The input is a json. The output must a json. For every site id assign the feedbacks to feedbackSummaries, if there is no fitting feedbackSummary then create a new one

{ "4f8e1830-d189-4318-94e7-0fe7df096e73": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 90, "feedbackText": "It would be nice, if I didn't need to contact customer service for deleting my account." }, { "id": 95, "feedbackText": "The website is very useful, but the mobile website could be a lot better." } ], "feedbackSummaries": [ "Add account delete option", "Fix cart", ] } }
{ "4f8e1830-d189-4318-94e7-0fe7df096e73": { "Add account delete option": [90], "Make mobile website better": [95], } }
The input is a json. The output must a json. For every site id assign the feedbacks to feedbackSummaries, if there is no fitting feedbackSummary then create a new one

{ "de5e26c1-0ad0-4741-b3c8-fb7ba4f5ea25": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 100, "feedbackText": "I would like to report a bug. When you open the account section and then go to signup page then the my-accout page is not reachable. It throws an error. It works after deleting the cookeis" }, { "id": 121, "feedbackText": "Your prices are way too high" } ], "feedbackSummaries": [] } }
{ "de5e26c1-0ad0-4741-b3c8-fb7ba4f5ea25": { "Account section is buggy": [100], "Cheaper prices": [121], } }

{ "258f0b3a-2687-4849-8da3-83083b09378f": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 101, "feedbackText": "It would be nice if you could offer shop pickup" }, { "id": 115, "feedbackText": "It is impossible to create invoices when the customers address is long" } ], "feedbackSummaries": [ "Allow long customer address" ] } }
{ "258f0b3a-2687-4849-8da3-83083b09378f": { "Add Click & Collect": [101], "Allow long customer address": [115], } }

{ "e33b2553-afff-41af-b0f8-e00df44a3105": { "feedbacks": [ { "id": 99, "feedbackText": "I received the product just yesterday. You promised a two day shipment, I waited two weeks.... Never buying here again" }, { "id": 116, "feedbackText": "The shipment must be faster" } ], "feedbackSummaries": [ "Search is not working", "Unable to delete account", "Add delete account option" ] } }
{ "e33b2553-afff-41af-b0f8-e00df44a3105": { "Faster shipments": [99, 116], } }
